text: I've learned this is a very long marriage doing a television show. I like the people that I work with to be people I enjoy, so you want to cast people who are as excited and enthusiastic as you are.
author: Shonda Rhimes

text: I am a firm believer in marriage. In the future I will be married.
author: Elisabetta Canalis

text: Marriage is one of the most sacred human institutions. I asked our Senators, as many South Dakotans have done, to protect marriage as a union between a man and a woman.
author: Mike Rounds

text: Other than marriage, she doesn't control me and I don't control her.
author: Gavyn Davies
